hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: obs_project_name
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description: 工程名，请参照如下格式（备注：分隔符支持英文逗号，空格和换行）： project1，project2 或者： project1 project2 ...
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.defaultValue: openEuler:Testing:BaseTools openEuler:Testing:KernelSpace openEuler:Testing:Common_Languages_Dependent_Tools openEuler:Testing:C openEuler:Testing:Java openEuler:Testing:Python openEuler:Testing:Perl openEuler:Testing:Ruby openEuler:Testing:Erlang openEuler:Testing:Meson openEuler:Testing:Nodejs openEuler:Testing:Qt openEuler:Testing:Ocaml openEuler:Testing:Lua openEuler:Testing:Golang openEuler:Testing:MultiLanguage openEuler:Testing:Mainline
